site.description: ECM Developer is an Eclipse plug-in aimed at supporting the development of applications using FileNet P8 system. It approaches the system from a developers point of view and tries to find solutions for day to day tasks. At this moment features include Object Store browsing, a Code Module editor and Java code generation. This plug-in uses the great 'Silk icon set 1.3' by Mark James at http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/

category-def.name: com.ecmdeveloper.plugin.contentEngine
category-def.label: Content Engine
category-def.description: This category contains the Content Engine features.
